description: This table contains information about contract comparisons performed for a claim. This includes the contract, prospective payment systems (PPS) pricer, and claim-level contractual allowed amount for each contract evaluated for the claim. Each row in the table represents one contract that was evaluated for a claim.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim info record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CONTRACT_ID
columns.description: Each contract that was evaluated for the claim for contract comparison.

columns.name: CONTRACT_ID_CONTRACT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Vendor-Network contract.

columns.name: CONTRACT_CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The contact date used for each contract evaluated for the claim for contract comparison.

columns.name: ALLOWED_AMT
columns.description: The total claim allowed amount calculated using each contract for contract comparison.
